tool_description: Market analytics and insights correlated with the Media trends
name: Media-Obsessed Market
title: Media-Obsessed Market

api_list.name: predict
api_list.description:
Gives a list of companies that are predicted to move the specified percentage up within daily trading. Allowed percentages are 0.4%(0.004) . Use with no optional parameters to get full data back. It is not large.
Verify the performance using predict_evaluation endpoint or on the website mbaassist.co (navigate to Dashboards)

api_list.name: transactions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://media-obsessed-market.p.rapidapi.com/transaction/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-obsessed-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://media-obsessed-market.p.rapidapi.com/transaction/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-obsessed-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: predict_evaluation
api_list.description: Provides evaluation of using predictions for up to 60 days earlier
